quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Every morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
author: Buddha

quote: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.
author: Buddha

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Buddha

quote: If you light a lamp for somebody, it will also brighten your path.
author: Buddha

quote: Happiness will never come to those who fail to appreciate what they already have.
author: Buddha

quote: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
author: Buddha

quote: You only lose what you cling to.
author: Buddha

quote: Rule your mind or it will rule you.
author: Buddha

quote: The root of suffering is attachment.
author: Buddha

quote: Nothing can harm you as much as your own thoughts unguarded.
author: Buddha

quote: Learn this from water: loud splashes the brook but the oceans depth are calm.
author: Buddha

quote: Avoid evil deeds as a man who loves life avoids poison.
author: Buddha

quote: Believe nothing, no matter where you read it, or who said it, no matter if I have said it, unless it agrees with your own reason and your own common sense.
author: Buddha

quote: Teach this triple truth to all: A generous heart, kind speech, and a life of service and compassion are the things which renew humanity.
author: Buddha

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?
author: Buddha

quote: Every human being is the author of his own health or disease.
author: Buddha

quote: Nothing is permanent.
author: Buddha

quote: Set your heart on doing good. Do it over and over again and you will be filled with joy.
author: Buddha

quote: True love is born from understanding.
author: Buddha

quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
author: Buddha

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly our whole life would change.
author: Buddha

quote: It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you.
author: Buddha

quote: Three things can not hide for long: the Moon, the Sun and the Truth.
author: Buddha

quote: Your purpose in life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it.
author: Buddha

quote: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
author: Buddha

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Simplicity, patience, compassion. These three are your greatest treasures. Simple in actions and thoughts, you return to the source of being. Patient with both friends and enemies, you accord with the way things are. Compassionate toward yourself, you reconcile all beings in the world.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them; that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The truth is not always beautiful, nor beautiful words the truth.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The best fighter is never angry.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you are depressed you are living in the past. If you are anxious you are living in the future. If you are at peace you are living in the present.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Because one believes in oneself, one doesn't try to convince others. Because one is content with oneself, one doesn't need others' approval. Because one accepts oneself, the whole world accepts him or her.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: At the center of your being you have the answer; you know who you are and you know what you want.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Be careful what you water your dreams with. Water them with worry and fear and you will produce weeds that choke the life from your dream. Water them with optimism and solutions and you will cultivate success. Always be on the lookout for ways to turn a problem into an opportunity for success. Always be on the lookout for ways to nurture your dream.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Do you have the patience to wait until your mud settles and the water is clear?
author: Lao Tzu

quote: The flame that burns Twice as bright burns half as long.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Silence is a source of Great Strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you understand others you are smart. If you understand yourself you are illuminated. If you overcome others you are powerful. If you overcome yourself you have strength. If you know how to be satisfied you are rich. If you can act with vigor, you have a will. If you don't lose your objectives you can be long-lasting. If you die without loss, you are eternal.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Stop thinking, and end your problems.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Manifest plainness, Embrace simplicity, Reduce selfishness, Have few desires.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A leader is best when people barely know he exists. Of a good leader, who talks little, when his work is done, his aim fulfilled, they will say, “We did this ourselves.”
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Music in the soul can be heard by the universe.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Act without expectation.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Respond intelligently even to unintelligent treatment.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Are you looking for me? I am in the next seat. My shoulder is against yours... He is the breath inside the breath.
author: Kabir

quote: Many have died; you also will die. The drum of death is being beaten. The world has fallen in love with a dream. Only sayings of the wise will remain.
author: Kabir

quote: All know that the drop merges into the ocean, but few know that the ocean merges into the drop.
author: Kabir

quote: ...But if a mirror ever makes you sad you should know that it does not know you.
author: Kabir

quote: If you want the truth, I’ll tell you the truth: Listen to the secret sound, the real sound, which is inside you.
author: Kabir

quote: The river that flows in you also flows in me.
author: Kabir

quote: I laugh when I hear that the fish in the water is thirsty... if you can't find where your soul is hidden, for you the world will never be real!
author: Kabir

quote: ... What is God? He is the breath inside the breath.
author: Kabir

quote: Love does not grow on trees or brought in the market, but if one wants to be 'LOVED' one must first know how to give (unconditional) LOVE.
author: Kabir

quote: If you don't break your ropes while you're alive, do you think ghosts will do it after?
author: Kabir

quote: Wherever you are is the entry point.
author: Kabir

quote: The guest is inside you, and also inside me... The universe is shot through in all parts by a single sort of love.
author: Kabir

quote: There is dew on these poems in the morning, and at night a cool breeze may rise from them...
author: Kabir

quote: The sun is within me and so is the moon.
author: Kabir

quote: Listen, my friend. He who loves understands.
author: Kabir

quote: I talk to my inner lover, and I say, why such rush?... and that's why everything you do has some weird sense of failure in it.
author: Kabir

quote: I don't think there is such a thing as an intelligent mega-rich person. For who with a fine mind can look out upon this world and hoard what can nourish a thousand souls.
author: Kabir

quote: Nindak niyare rakhiye aangan kuti chhawaye; Bin sabun pani bina nirmal karat subhaye.
author: Kabir

quote: What is seen is not the Truth... Say Kabir, awareness alone will overcome illusion.
author: Kabir

quote: Listen to the secret sound, the real sound, which is inside you. The one no one talks of speaks the secret sound to himself, and he is the one who has made it all.
author: Kabir

quote: The Lord is in me, the Lord is in you, as life is in every seed, put false pride away and seek the Lord within.
author: Kabir

quote: Slowly slowly O mind... Everything in own pace happens, Gardner may water a hundred buckets... Fruit arrives only in its season.
author: Kabir

quote: बुरा जो देखण मैं चला, बुरा ना मिलया कोए जो मन खोजा अपना, तो मुझसे बुरा ना कोए
author: Kabir

quote: It is time to put up a love-swing!... and cover yourself inside entirely with the shadow of night.
author: Kabir

quote: As long as a human being worries about when he will die, and what he has that is his, all of his works are zero...
author: Kabir

quote: You have left Your Beloved and are thinking of others: and this is why your work is in vain.
author: Kabir

quote: When at last you are come to the ocean of happiness, do not go back thirsty.
author: Kabir

quote: No one could understand the secret of this weaver... He fixed the earth and the sky as the pillars, and he used the sun and the moon as two shuttles...
author: Kabir

quote: You have slept millions and millions of years. Why not wake up this morning?
author: Kabir

quote: Just throw away all thoughts of imaginary things, and stand firm in that which you are.
author: Kabir

quote: It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: A gift is pure when it is given from the heart to the right person at the right time and at the right place, and when we expect nothing in return.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The happiness which comes from long practice, which leads to the end of suffering, which at first is like poison, but at last like nectar - this kind of happiness arises from the serenity of one's own mind.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Curving back within myself I create again and again.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Anyone who is steady in his determination for the advanced stage of spiritual realization and can equally tolerate the onslaughts of distress and happiness is certainly a person eligible for liberation.
author: A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The peace of God is with them whose mind and soul are in harmony, who are free from desire and wrath, who know their own soul.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: He who has let go of hatred who treats all beings with kindness and compassion, who is always serene, unmoved by pain or pleasure, free of the 'I' and 'mine,' self-controlled, firm and patient, his whole mind focused on me — that is the man I love best.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Perform all thy actions with mind concentrated on the Divine, renouncing attachment and looking upon success and failure with an equal eye. Spirituality implies equanimity.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work. You should never engage in action for the sake of reward, nor should you long for inaction.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Hell has three hates: lust, anger and greed.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The man who sees me in everything and everything within me will not be lost to me, nor will I ever be lost to him.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: I am Time, the great destroyer of the world.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: He who experiences the unity of life sees his own Self in all beings, and all beings in his own Self, and looks on everything with an impartial eye.
author: Krishna-Dwaipayana Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Set thy heart upon thy work, but never on its reward.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: I have become Death, the destroyer of worlds.
author: Bhagavad Gita

quote: For the senses wander, and when one lets the mind follow them, it carries wisdom away like a windblown ship on the waters.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The nonpermanent appearance of happiness and distress, and their disappearance in due course, are like the appearance and disappearance of winter and summer seasons.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The wise grieve neither for the living nor for the dead.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: They say that life is an accident, driven by sexual desire, that the universe has no moral order, no truth, no God.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: We behold what we are, and we are what we behold.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: He is knowledge, He is the object of knowledge, and He is the goal of knowledge. He is situated in everyone's heart.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Perform all work carefully, guided by compassion.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: The embodied soul is eternal in existence, indestructible, and infinite, only the material body is factually perishable.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: We never really encounter the world; all we experience is our own nervous system.
author: Krishna-Dwaipayana Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: It is Nature that causes all movement. Deluded by the ego, the fool harbors the perception that says 'I did it'.
author: Veda Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: O Krishna, the mind is restless.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Feelings of heat and cold, pleasure and pain, are caused by the contact of the senses with their objects. They come and they go, never lasting long. You must accept them.
author: Anonymous, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: We are not cabin-dwellers, born to a life cramped and confined; we are meant to explore, to seek, to push the limits of our potential as human beings.
author: Ved Vyasa, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: I enter into each planet, and by My energy they stay in orbit. I become the moon and thereby supply the juice of life to all vegetables.
author: Krishna, The Bhagavad Gita

quote: Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
author: Rumi

quote: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there.
author: Rumi

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion.
author: Rumi

quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
author: Rumi

quote: What you seek is seeking you.
author: Rumi

quote: Don’t grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form.
author: Rumi

quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Rumi

quote: Dance, when you're broken open. Dance, if you've torn the bandage off. Dance in the middle of the fighting. Dance in your blood. Dance when you're perfectly free.
author: Rumi

quote: Don't be satisfied with stories, how things have gone with others. Unfold your own myth.
author: Rumi

quote: If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
author: Rumi

quote: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy.
author: Rumi

quote: You were born with wings, why prefer to crawl through life?
author: Rumi

quote: Forget safety. Live where you fear to live. Destroy your reputation. Be notorious.
author: Rumi

quote: Knock, And He'll open the door. Vanish, And He'll make you shine like the sun. Fall, And He'll raise you to the heavens. Become nothing, And He'll turn you into everything.
author: Rumi

quote: Raise your words, not voice. It is rain that grows flowers, not thunder.
author: Rumi

quote: When I am with you, we stay up all night. When you're not here, I can't go to sleep. Praise God for those two insomnias! And the difference between them.
author: Rumi

quote: My soul is from elsewhere, I'm sure of that, and I intend to end up there.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quote: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation.
author: Rumi

quote: I want to see you. Know your voice. Recognize you when you first come 'round the corner...
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quote: Sell your cleverness and buy bewilderment.
author: Rumi

quote: In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems...
author: Rumi

quote: Ignore those that make you fearful and sad, that degrade you back towards disease and death.
author: Rumi Jalalud-Din

quote: Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quote: لا تجزع من جرحك، وإلا فكيف للنور أن يتسلل إلى باطنك؟
author: جلال الدين الرومي

quote: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself.
author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
author: Rumi

quote: Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.
author: Rumi

quote: I want to sing like the birds sing, not worrying about who hears or what they think.
author: Rumi

quote: Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love.
author: Rumi

quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life; dream of it; think of it; live on that idea...
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
author: Vivekananda

quote: In a conflict between the heart and the brain, follow your heart.
author: Vivekananda

quote: In a day, when you don't come across any problems - you can be sure that you are travelling in a wrong path.
author: Vivekananda

quote: The great secret of true success, of true happiness, is this: the man or woman who asks for no return...
author: Vivekananda

quote: All power is within you; you can do anything and everything. Believe in that, do not believe that you are weak...
author: Vivekananda

quote: The greatest religion is to be true to your own nature. Have faith in yourselves.
author: Vivekananda

quote: The greatest sin is to think yourself weak.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Anything that makes weak - physically, intellectually and spiritually, reject it as poison.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Dare to be free, dare to go as far as your thought leads, and dare to carry that out in your life.
author: Vivekananda

quote: We are what our thoughts have made us; so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live; they travel far.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Arise, awake, stop not till the goal is reached.
author: Vivekananda

quote: They alone live, who live for others.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Be not Afraid of anything. You will do Marvelous work. It is Fearlessness that brings Heaven even in a moment.
author: Vivekananda

quote: All love is expansion, all selfishness is contraction...
author: Vivekananda

quote: You cannot believe in God until you believe in yourself.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Neither seek nor avoid, take what comes.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Feel nothing, know nothing, do nothing, have nothing, give up all to God...
author: Vivekananda

quote: Strength is Life, Weakness is Death. Expansion is Life, Contraction is Death...
author: Vivekananda

quote: Comfort is no test of truth. Truth is often far from being comfortable.
author: Vivekananda

quote: The fire that warms us can also consume us; it is not the fault of the fire.
author: Vivekananda

quote: Learn Everything that is Good from Others, but bring it in, and in your own way absorb it...
author: Vivekananda

quote: Do one thing at a Time, and while doing it put your whole Soul into it to the exclusion of all else.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Was there ever a more horrible blasphemy than the statement that all the knowledge of God is confined to this or that book?
author: Vivekananda

quote: Whatever you think that you will be. If you think yourself weak, weak you will be; if you think yourself strong, you will be.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: All differences in this world are of degree, and not of kind, because oneness is the secret of everything.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Each work has to pass through these stages—ridicule, opposition, and then acceptance...
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: We are responsible for what we are, and whatever we wish ourselves to be, we have the power to make ourselves...
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Ask nothing; want nothing in return. Give what you have to give; it will come back to you...
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: A fool may buy all the books in the world, and they will be in his library; but he will be able to read only those that he deserves to.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Compassion links us to others. We share a common humanity with a common wish to be happy, free from suffering and to live with grace.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: I am… I am includes the fact that I do beautiful things and I do crappy things, and I am.
author: Ram Dass

quote: You do not have to be good./ You do not have to walk on your knees/ for a hundred miles through the desert, repenting./ You only have to let the soft animal of your body/ love what it loves.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: If you are unkind to yourself, you will be unkind to others. And if you are negligent of yourself, you will be that to others. Only by feeling compassion for yourself can you feel compassion for others. If you cannot love yourself you cannot love others, and you cannot stand to see others loved. If you cannot treat your own self kindly, you will resent that treatment when you see it in anyone else. If you cannot love yourself, loving others becomes a very painful endeavor with only occasional moments of comfort. In other words, loving others, or how you treat yourself, is your own dose of your own medicine, that you really give to others at the same time.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: We can still be crazy after all these years. We can still be angry after all these years. We can still be timid or jealous or full of feelings of unworthiness. The point is... not to try to throw ourselves away and become something better. It's about befriending who we already are.
author: Pema Chodron

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a life-long romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: It's okay to be a compassionate mess.
author: Kristin Neff

quote: In a world, a mind, a body at war, no quality active or passive is more healing than essential compassion.
author: Stephen Levine

quote: I love myself. The quietest. Simplest. Most powerful. Revolution. Ever.
author: Nayyirah Waheed

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: If we take good care of ourselves, we help everyone. We stop being a source of suffering to the world, and we become a reservoir of joy and freshness.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: Kind words are like honey, sweet to the soul and healthy for the body.
author: Proverbs 16:24

quote: When we struggle, we give ourselves compassion not to feel better, but because we feel bad.
author: Kristin Neff & Christopher Germer

quote: And also, I came to see that there are angels in our lives who take many forms: sometimes in the guise of a caretaker, sometimes a compassionate friend or family member. But always, we will be our own best friend when we care about what we say to ourselves in our minds and use our language to open the door to new possibilities and move past our anger and fears.
author: Guruatma Khalsa & Jeannette Pavandev Darcy

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Self-compassion is like a muscle. The more we practice flexing it, especially when life doesn’t go exactly according to plan, the stronger and more resilient our compassion muscle becomes.
author: Sharon Salzberg

quote: A moment of self-compassion can change your entire day. A string of such moments can change the course of your life.
author: Christopher Germer

quote: The only thing that was ever wrong with me was my belief that there was something wrong with me. I quit spending my life trying to control myself and began to trust myself. We only control what we don’t trust. We can either control ourselves or love ourselves, but we can’t do both.
author: Glennon Doyle

quote: The capacity for compassion and response grows slowly from cultivation and practice.
author: Stephanie Kaza

quote: You have been criticizing yourself for years, and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
author: Louise Hay

quote: We don’t make lasting, constructive changes in our lives because of shame or self-loathing. We finally decide we were made for something more. This might come to us as a very small sense of knowing, but it’s a change in perspective, and it is the soil for new life.
author: Leeana Tankersley

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Where we think we need more self-discipline, we usually need more self-love.
author: Tara Mohr

quote: Loving yourself is having reverence ultimately for life. …It’s a deep gratitude for the life you have.
author: Brendon Burchard

quote: When we truly care for ourselves, it becomes possible to care far more profoundly about other people. The more alert and sensitive we are to our own needs, the more loving and generous we can be toward others.
author: Eda LeShan

quote: Wherever we’re trying to go, we do not bully ourselves there. We believe ourselves there.
author: Leeana Tankersley

quote: No amount of self-improvement can make up for any lack of self-acceptance.
author: Robert Holden

quote: True love of self is not narcissistic, nor is it even self-centered. Those traits are nothing but the contrived window-dressing of self-hate. True love of self is simple acceptance. Without it, you can never be happy, nor even fully healthy. Without it, you can never love others.
author: Dharma Singh Khalsa M.D. and Cameron Stauth

quote: I learned…that sometimes there is just very little in life we can control. But one thing we can always control is how we treat ourselves. And that one thing can change everything.
author: Leanna Tankersley

quote: You know quite well, deep within you, that there is only a single magic, a single power, a single salvation… and that is called loving.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Perfectionism is self-abuse of the highest order.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: What is happening in your innermost self is worthy of your entire love; somehow you must find a way to work at it.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: How much we know and understand ourselves is critically important, but there is something that is even more essential to living a wholehearted life: loving ourselves.
author: Brené Brown

quote: Self-love is learning how to listen to your own heart so you can understand someone else’s.
author: Zella Sage

quote: Self-awareness and self-love matter. Who we are is how we lead.
author: Brené Brown

quote: While you might think it's a trick, having affection for one's goofy, crabby, annoying, lovely self is home. This has been my meager salvation.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: The way you treat your own heart is the way you will end up treating everyone else’s.
author: John Eldridge

quote: Compassion for others begins with kindness to ourselves.
author: Pema Chodron

quote: A mind committed to compassion is like an overflowing reservoir – a constant source of energy, determination and kindness.
author: The Dalai Lama
